document.title: Technical Bulletins: The 1992 MTAS Salary and Fringe Benefits Survey: Inflation Outpaces Pay
document.abstract: In 1992, salary increases for city employees slowed from the accelerated rate of last year to more accurately reflect the figures reported by Bureau of Labor Statistics' Consumer Price Index. This Technical Bulletin summarizes the findings of the annual salary and fringe benefit survey conducted by The University of Tennessee's Municipal Technical Advisory Service.
